data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Corinthians needs to be cautious. Goianiense GO have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Goianiense GO.
In Sao Paulo, Goianiense GO push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In Sao Paulo Goianiense GO attack through Marlon Freitas. The finish is off target, however.
Corinthians have a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
Gustavo Ferrareis for Goianiense GO drives towards goal at Neo Quimica Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 7, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Corinthians's Cassio is back in action after a slight knock.
Cassio is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 9, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Corinthians throw-in in Goianiense GO's half.
Corinthians's Luan misses with an attempt on goal.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
In the minute 11, Free kick in a good position for Goianiense GO!
Can Corinthians capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Goianiense GO's half?
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 13, Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO at Neo Quimica Arena.
Corinthians to take a throw-in in Goianiense GO territory.
In the minute 14, Corinthians have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
At Neo Quimica Arena, Corinthians are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
In the minute 16, Corinthians's Leo Natel is on target but unsuccessful.
Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Corinthians is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Goianiense GO drives forward and Hyuri gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Goianiense GO have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Corinthians.
In the minute 18, Goianiense GO push forward at Neo Quimica Arena and Chico gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Corinthians defence.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Ball safe as Goianiense GO is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 20, Can Goianiense GO get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Corinthians's half?
Matheuzinho (Goianiense GO) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Sao Paulo Goianiense GO's Hyuri is caught offside.
In the minute 22, In Sao Paulo a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Goianiense GO in the half of Corinthians.
Throw-in high up the field for Goianiense GO in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 24, Corinthians awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Goianiense GO's Nicolas Vichiatto breaks free at Neo Quimica Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Corinthians at Neo Quimica Arena.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Corinthians in their own half.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 28, Corinthians's Roni Medeiros de Moura has been booked in Sao Paulo.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
Corinthians awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Corinthians.
Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
In the minute 34, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sao Paulo.
In the minute 36, Michel (Corinthians) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Goianiense GO a goal kick.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Goianiense GO in their own half.
In the minute 37, Goianiense GO's Matheuzinho gets in a shot on goal at Neo Quimica Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Marlon Freitas gets his shot on target but fails to score for Goianiense GO.
In the minute 40, Goianiense GO have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Goianiense GO drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Goianiense GO have a goal kick.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Goianiense GO.
Free kick for Goianiense GO in the half of Corinthians.
Leo Natel of Corinthians smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Corinthians.
Goianiense GO awarded a free kick in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Corinthians in their own half.
Goianiense GO are coming forward and Gustavo Ferrareis gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Corinthians goal kick.
In the minute 45, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior blows to end the first-half.
